title: Tarte Clean Slate 360° Creaseless 12-Hr Smoothing Eye Primer 0.39 oz
description: Tarte Cosmetics Clean Slate 360 Creaseless 12-Hour Smoothing Eye Primer extends the wear time of your eye makeup while conditioning the delicate skin around your eye area. Beeswax helps to lock in moisture to prevent crumbling or flaking and helps ensure easy application. Vitamin E softens and hydrates your skin to help clear away puffiness and dark circles. Mineral-based pigments help prevent irritation and conceal discoloration.

title: Joan Rivers Great Hair Day® fill-in powder by AsWeChange
description: Formulated with ProcapilTM, Joan Rivers Great Hair Day fill-in powder strengthens hair while providing instant fullness. Applied to your scalp with the included brush, Joan Rivers hair powder resists running yet washes off without staining. This hair loss product for women includes flipopen mirror. Specify color code. 0.24 oz.
